Text.Page:
The mines in the Brimstone Highlands are overrun with enemies. We must have those resources.

You are to destroy the {@LinkCreature:4#1031#sooty sporewalkers}, {@LinkCreature:4#1032#smoldering ghilliedhus}, {@LinkCreature:4#1041#ashstalker wolves}, {@LinkCreature:4#1051#devan war golems}, {@LinkCreature:4#1052#fallen devan protectors}, {@LinkCreature:4#1061#devan dark knights}, and {@LinkCreature:4#1062#risen devan infantry}.

Report to Keinie at Cauldron Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
